title: Bug 17703 - Edit/Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
description: The Edit/Add Task action in the application is currently using a different dialog than the one used by the Java Editor. This inconsistency can confuse users and make the task creation process less intuitive. The application should update the Edit/Add Task action to use the same Workbench dialog as the Java Editor for a consistent user experience.
OB: Currently, the Edit/Add Task action in the application uses a different dialog than the one used by the Java Editor.
EB: The Edit/Add Task action should use the Workbench dialog, similar to how the Java Editor does.
SR: Update the Edit/Add Task action to use the Workbench dialog, ensuring consistency with the Java Editor.
